title: Christian Faith Study
description: The book Christian faith study Is a 24 topic study guide that leads the reader to seek the word of God and encourages them to dig for answers. Filled with questions and lines to fill out the answers, this book will truly aid every person to own the truth of Gods word in a personal way. “Christian faith study“ covers an extremely wide range of topics ranging from the origins of the Bible, hermeneutics, salvation, baptism, The Godhead, sanctification, prayer, faith, fellowship/body life, understanding evil and suffering, satan and spiritual warfare, predestination and free will, eschatology, cults and world religions, and the list goes on. It is truly a unique work.At a time when biblical illiteracy plagues many modern churches and more and more people are looking for answers, this valuable resource is made available to aid and equip every sincere seeker of truth. This study will equip you with knowledge needed to not only help you grow in your own walk with God, but also equip you to provide answers for others seeking truth as well. Avoiding the natural tendency to be dogmatic on debatable nonessentials, this study has been written with balance respecting a broad denominational range. Following scriptural principles, the author takes a firm stance on the essential doctrines pertaining to the nature of God and salvation, while respectfully presenting nonessentials in a balanced manner that leads the reader to come to their own conclusions. So whether you are a seeker of biblical truth, a new believer, or even a seasoned Christian, this study has something for you!
